#summary Remove user account information.
#labels Protocol-User

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||RemoveUserData||String||Yes||
||`UserID`||UUID of the user for which info should be deleted||UUID||Yes||
||`Key`||Key to remove||String||Yes||

{{{
RequestMethod=RemoveUserData
&UserID=913180a1-4d79-49a3-9576-05b13896a5f2
&Key=Suspended
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if key was erased or there was no key to erase, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":true,
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":false,
    "Message":"An unknown error occurred"
}
}}}
